name: Soulike
description:
Soulike

Soulike is a Dungeon Crawler.
You entered the Soul Dungeon, in the hope to get one of the Ultra Purple Souls.
These are guarded by many monsters and the devil himself.

Controls:

X/Z: open inventory
C/V: close inventory
Up/Down/Left/Right: attack/walk/open chests

The Game was made in Pico-8.
Thanks to Krystman from Lazy Devs Academy for the tutorial.

Feel free to write me feedback here: https://discord.gg/q5w4gbT
